attributes.action: Force the banks to pass on Bank of England base rate cuts
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The banks are saying they can't pass on interest rates to the general public because the inter bank lending rate is too high but the inter bank lending rate is set by the banks themselves.  
All banks that have received tax payers money should be forced to set their inter bank lending rates in line with the Bank of England lending rate.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
